hypertension.text: Maintain blood pressure below 140/90 mmHg for most adults.
Lifestyle modifications include reduced sodium intake and regular exercise.
Monitor blood pressure regularly at home if diagnosed with hypertension.

diabetes.text: Target A1C level of less than 7% for most adults with diabetes.
Regular monitoring of blood glucose levels is recommended.
Maintain a balanced diet and regular physical activity.

general.text: Stay hydrated by drinking at least 8 glasses of water daily.
Get 7-9 hours of sleep per night for optimal health.
Regular physical activity of at least 150 minutes per week is recommended.
